alert.note: Alert for Chase; Custer; Frontier; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Frontier, Perkins, southeastern Keith, Chase, Lincoln, southwestern Logan, southeastern McPherson, southwestern Custer and Hayes Counties through 645 PM CDT/545 PM MDT/... At 611 PM CDT/511 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Ringgold to near Lamar. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Imperial, Grant, Stapleton, Hayes Center, Sutherland, Hershey, Wauneta, Paxton, Brady, Wallace, Maxwell, Madrid, Elsie, Wellfleet, Dickens, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Sarben and Ringgold. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 73. Highway 92 between mile markers 212 and 239. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 23. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 141 and 206. Highway 83 between mile markers 51 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Custer; Frontier; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins
